tr_quotes.quote: Eğer o işi her zaman yarına bırakmazsan, bir gün içerisinde birçok güzel şey yapılabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi içgüdülerinize güvenin. Hiç değilse hatalarınızın nedeni siz olursunuz, başkaları değil.
tr_quotes.author: Billy Wilder

tr_quotes.quote: Sen seçimlerinsin.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: Bir seçim yapmanız gerektiğinde; seçmemek de bir seçimdir.
tr_quotes.author: William James

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat bir oluş sürecidir. Geçmemiz gereken haller bileşimidir. İnsanın başarısızlığa uğradığı yer, bir hali belirleyip orada kalmakta ısrar ettiği yerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anais Nin

tr_quotes.quote: Üstesinden gelebildiğinizi yapın ve kalanı oluruna bırakın.
tr_quotes.author: Epictetus

tr_quotes.quote: İçinizden gelen sese kulak tıkamayın, ama o sesin yeterli olduğuna da inanmayın.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Heller

tr_quotes.quote: Bu hayattaki dertlerin yarısı çok hızlı evet demekten ve yeterince çabuk hayır dememektendir.
tr_quotes.author: Josh Billings

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatlarımız sadece risk aldığımızda gelişir ve alacağımız ilk ve en zor risk ise kendimize dürüst olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Walter Anderson

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük kendimizden sorumlu olma isteğidir.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kişinin dünyası ancak kalbinin büyüklüğü kadardır.
tr_quotes.author: Tanya A. Moore

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kahraman yapabileceğini yapandır.
tr_quotes.author: Romain Rolland

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta yapabileceğiniz en büyük hata, sürekli olarak bir hata yapabileceğiniz korkusudur.
tr_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan aklının doğal uçuşları zevkten zevke değil umuttan umudadır.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç korkmamışsan, utanmamışsan ya da incinmemişsen, hiç risk almamışsın demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Julia Soul

tr_quotes.quote: Başla, yürekli ol, bilge olmak için uğraş.
tr_quotes.author: Horace

tr_quotes.quote: Eleştiri, hiçbir şey söylemeyerek, hiçbir şey yapmayarak ve hiçbir şey olmayarak kolayca kurtulabileceğiniz bir şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristotle

tr_quotes.quote: Yüzünü güneşe karşı dön, gölgeler arkana düşecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Maori Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç sahip olmadığınız bir şeyi elde etmek için, hiç yapmadığınız bir şeyi yapmanız gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dalın ucuna gitmekten korkma, meyve oradadır.
tr_quotes.author: H. Jackson Browne

tr_quotes.quote: İçim dışım bir olduğu sürece, ne olduğum yeterlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Carl Rogers

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst olmak kazandırır, ama ödemesi yavaştır.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Doğruluk kendime gerçeği anlatmamdır. Dürüstlük ise diğer insanlara gerçeği anlatmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyden önce, kendinize dürüst olun ve yaptığınız şeyi kalpten yapmıyorsanız, onu yapmayı bırakın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada sadece sevinç olsaydı cesaretli ve sabırlı olmayı asla öğrenemezdik.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: En iyisini yapmak, hiç bir zaman denemeyi bırakmamaktır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gücünüzden kuşku duyduğunuzda, gücü kuşkunuza verirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük, özgür olduğunu iddia etmek değil, özgür yaşamaktır
tr_quotes.author: William Faulkner

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece kendine güven, o zaman nasıl yaşayacağını bileceksin.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat seçimlerinizin toplamıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Yaratıcılık, icat etmek, denemek, büyümek, risk almak, kuralları çiğnemek, hatalar yapmak ve zevk almaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Mary Lou Cook

tr_quotes.quote: Adım atmadan önce çok fazla düşünen insan hayatını tek ayak üzerinde geçirir.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Şimdiki güvenli sınırlarınız bir zamanlar bilinmeyen hudutlardı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinize güvenin. Yapabileceğinizi düşündüğünüzden daha fazlasını biliyorsunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen küçük bir adım en büyük cesaret hareketidir.
tr_quotes.author: Lauren Raffo

tr_quotes.quote: Başlangıcı yapmak işin üçte biridir.
tr_quotes.author: İrlanda Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamak tekrar ve tekrar ölmeyi istemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Pema Chodron

tr_quotes.quote: Kimse her şeyi yapamaz ama herkes bir şey yapabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seni gerçekçi olmaya zorlayan insanlar, genellikle kendi gerçeklik biçimlerini kabul etmeni isteyenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bugünün iyi planı yarının mükemmel planından daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün açtığımız ve kapadığımız kapılar yaşadığımız hayatlara karar verir.
tr_quotes.author: Flora Whittemore

tr_quotes.quote: Korkuyla karşılaştığımız her defa, güç, cesaret ve güven kazanırız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük kendinize yapılanlara karşı takındığınız tavırdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Sınırlarımızı kabul ettikten sonra onun ötesine gidelim.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyayı iyileştirmeye başlamadan önce kimsenin tek bir an bile beklemeye ihtiyacı olmaması ne kadar mükemmel.
tr_quotes.author: Anne Frank

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta başlıca iki seçim vardır: koşulları olduğu gibi kabul etmek, ya da onları değiştirme sorumluluğunu kabul etmek.
tr_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

tr_quotes.quote: Büyümek ve gerçekten kim olduğunuzu bulmak cesaret ister.
tr_quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

tr_quotes.quote: Vazgeçmek dünyanın sonu değil; yeni bir hayatın başlangıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada taklit edilemeyen tek şey cesarettir.
tr_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

tr_quotes.quote: Tümüyle canlı, tümüyle insan ve tamamen uyanık olmak sürekli olarak yuvadan atılmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Pema Chodron

tr_quotes.quote: Zengin bir hayatın sırrı bitişlerden daha çok başlangıçların olmasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Dave Weinbaum

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı şeyleri zor yapan, onun zor olduğunu düşünmemizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: Riskleri tükettiğiniz tek zaman onları almayı bıraktığınız zamandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyayı iyileştiren yer, öncelikle kişinin kendi kalbinde, kafasında ve ellerindedir.
tr_quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

tr_quotes.quote: Tamamen kendimiz değilsek, gerçekten şu anda değilsek, her şeyi kaçırırız.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Girişimci gibi düşün; düşünce insanı gibi hareket et.
tr_quotes.author: Henri L. Bergson

tr_quotes.quote: Düştüğünden bir defa daha fazla kalkarsan üstesinden gelirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat, seçimlerden ibarettir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Olumlu yönü, potansiyeli görün ve çaba gösterin.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat insanın cesaretine göre küçülür veya büyür.
tr_quotes.author: Anais Nin

tr_quotes.quote: En derinden söylenen bir ‘Hayır’, birilerini memnun etmek için veya daha kötüsü bir sorunu önlemek için söylenen bir ‘Evet’ ten daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Ne olduğumu bıraktığımda, neysem o olabilirim.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Tepki vermek yerine düşünerek hareket etmeye karar verdiğimiz zaman olasılıklar çok sayıdadır.
tr_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Yoldaki kavis, dönüş yaptığınız takdirde, yolun sonu değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinize değer vermezseniz, zamanınıza değer vermeyeceksiniz. Zamanınıza değer vermezseniz, onu değerlendiremeyeceksiniz.
tr_quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

tr_quotes.quote: Sorunlarınızın sizi geri itmesine değil; hayallerinizin sizi ileri götürmesine izin verin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kesin olan tek şey belirsizliktir ve güvensizlikle yaşamayı bilmek ise tek güvendir.
tr_quotes.author: John Allen Paulos

tr_quotes.quote: En önemli nokta kendini kabul etmek ve iki ayağının üzerinde durmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

tr_quotes.quote: Harekete geçmek için duygularınızın değişmesini beklemeyin. Harekete geçin, duygularınız değişecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Barbara Baron

tr_quotes.quote: Kıyıyı gözden kaybetmeye cesaret etmedikçe insan yeni okyanuslar keşfedemez.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Korku, gerçeğe yaklaşmanın doğal bir tepkisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Pema Chodron

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın trajedisi çok erken bitmesi değil, başlamak için çok uzun beklememizdir.
tr_quotes.author: W.M. Lewis

tr_quotes.quote: Ayın üzerinde ayak izleri bulunuyorken bana asla gökyüzünün sınır olduğunu anlatma.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat, insanın cesaretine göre büyür veya küçülür.
tr_quotes.author: Anais Nin

tr_quotes.quote: Cesaret ve karakter sahibi kişiler, başkalarına her zaman pek korkutucu görünür.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

en_quotes.quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: Courage, sacrifice, determination, commitment, toughness, heart, talent, guts. That's what little girls are made of
en_quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Courtesy is as much a mark of a gentleman as courage
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: The first virtue in a soldier is endurance of fatigue; courage is only the second virtue
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it
en_quotes.author: Tori Amos

en_quotes.quote: We want deeper sincerity of motive, a greater courage in speech and earnestness in action
en_quotes.author: Sarojini Naidu

en_quotes.quote: It is a wise man who knows where courage ends and stupidity begins
en_quotes.author: Jerome Cady

en_quotes.quote: True courage is like a kite; a contrary wind raises it higher
en_quotes.author: John Petit-Senn

en_quotes.quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Courage without conscience is a wild beast
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you have never had the courage to commit
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Jump, and you will find out how to unfold your wings as you fall
en_quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

en_quotes.quote: Optimism is essential to achievement and it is also the foundation of courage and true progress
en_quotes.author: Nicholas M. Butler

en_quotes.quote: There are no easy answers, but there are simple answers. We must have the courage to do what we know is morally right
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: There is in true beauty, as in courage, something which narrow souls cannot dare to admire
en_quotes.author: William Congreve

en_quotes.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore
en_quotes.author: Andre Gide

en_quotes.quote: Change takes courage
en_quotes.author: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

en_quotes.quote: In the Soviet army it takes more courage to retreat than advance
en_quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

en_quotes.quote: I beg you take courage; the brave soul can mend even disaster
en_quotes.author: Catherine the Great

en_quotes.quote: To see the right and not to do it is cowardice
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Happy are those who dare courageously to defend what they love
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: The word courage - God, I love that word. Words are so important to me
en_quotes.author: Peter Fonda

en_quotes.quote: A team is where a boy can prove his courage on his own. A gang is where a coward goes to hide
en_quotes.author: Mickey Mantle

en_quotes.quote: It requires more courage to suffer than to die
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Discouragement is not the absence of adequacy but the absence of courage
en_quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Courage is rightly esteemed the first of human qualities... because it is the quality which guarantees all others
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Let us not pray to be sheltered from dangers but to be fearless when facing them
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: How few there are who have courage enough to own their faults, or resolution enough to mend them
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Part of courage is simple consistency
en_quotes.author: Peggy Noonan

en_quotes.quote: Creativity takes courage
en_quotes.author: Henri Matisse

en_quotes.quote: Do not lose courage in considering your own imperfections
en_quotes.author: Saint Francis de Sales

en_quotes.quote: I actually learned that you should never give up, and if you love something, take courage and absolutely go after it
en_quotes.author: Jessica Jung

en_quotes.quote: Australia is a nation of compassion. Courage and compassion. And the third of these great values: resilience
en_quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

en_quotes.quote: I have a lot of things to prove to myself. One is that I can live my life fearlessly
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval
en_quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

en_quotes.quote: He is a man of courage who does not run away, but remains at his post and fights against the enemy
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Faced with what is right, to leave it undone shows a lack of courage
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: To see what is right and not to do it is want of courage, or of principle
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Boldness be my friend
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage in that cage no matter who you are
en_quotes.author: Rose Namajunas

en_quotes.quote: From caring comes courage
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Either you decide to stay in the shallow end of the pool or you go out in the ocean
en_quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

en_quotes.quote: True courage is being afraid, and going ahead and doing your job anyhow, that's what courage is
en_quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

en_quotes.quote: I think we all have empathy. We may not have enough courage to display it
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: The opposite for courage is not cowardice, it is conformity. Even a dead fish can go with the flow
en_quotes.author: Jim Hightower

en_quotes.quote: Curiosity, rationalization, and laziness are no match against courage, self-control, and mental toughness
en_quotes.author: John Bytheway

en_quotes.quote: Fearlessness is not only possible, it is the ultimate joy. When you touch nonfear, you are free
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: I tend to think you're fearless when you recognize why you should be scared of things, but do them anyway
en_quotes.author: Christian Bale

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: If you could get up the courage to begin, you have the courage to succeed
en_quotes.author: David Viscott

en_quotes.quote: What is more mortifying than to feel that you have missed the plum for want of courage to shake the tree?
en_quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

en_quotes.quote: Nothing gives us courage more readily than the desire to avoid looking like a damn fool
en_quotes.author: Dean Koontz

en_quotes.quote: A military coup needs a sacrifice and courage that you can't find in an army without morale
en_quotes.author: Jalal Talabani

en_quotes.quote: The only courage that matters is the kind that gets you from one moment to the next
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of despair; it is, rather, the capacity to move ahead in spite of despair
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: Innovation is so hard and so frustrating; it takes the intersections of people with courage, vision, and resources
en_quotes.author: Dean Kamen

en_quotes.quote: A timid person is frightened before a danger, a coward during the time, and a courageous person afterward
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: Courage is doing what you are afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you are scared
en_quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

en_quotes.quote: Courage consists not in blindly overlooking danger, but in seeing it, and conquering it
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: Falsehood is cowardice, the truth courage
en_quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

en_quotes.quote: Courage stands halfway between cowardice and rashness, one of which is a lack, the other an excess of courage
en_quotes.author: Plutarch

en_quotes.quote: I'm sick of not having the courage to be an absolute nobody
en_quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

en_quotes.quote: Courage is often lack of insight, whereas cowardice in many cases is based on good information
en_quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

en_quotes.quote: More firm and sure the hand of courage strikes, when it obeys the watchful eye of caution
en_quotes.author: James Thomson

en_quotes.quote: Real courage is knowing what faces you and knowing how to face it
en_quotes.author: Timothy Dalton

en_quotes.quote: It is right to endure with resignation what the gods send, and to face one's enemies with courage
en_quotes.author: Pericles

en_quotes.quote: Courage! I have shown it for years; think you I shall lose it at the moment when my sufferings are to end?
en_quotes.author: Marie Antoinette

en_quotes.quote: What we want from modern dance is courage and audacity
en_quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

en_quotes.quote: Believe in individual initiatives, in courage, in risk
en_quotes.author: Emmanuel Macron

en_quotes.quote: To me, there is no greater act of courage than being the one who kisses first
en_quotes.author: Janeane Garofalo

en_quotes.quote: Courage is rightly esteemed the first of human qualities - because it is the quality which guarantees all others
en_quotes.author: Joseph Chamberlain

en_quotes.quote: Ingenuity, plus courage, plus work, equals miracles
en_quotes.author: Bob Richards

en_quotes.quote: Despair gives courage to a coward
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Courage is never to let your actions be influenced by your fears
en_quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

en_quotes.quote: I feel quite fearless protecting the people I love
en_quotes.author: Paloma Faith

en_quotes.quote: Creating art is painful. It takes time, practice, and the courage to stand alone
en_quotes.author: Maria Semple

en_quotes.quote: I think there's a difference between ditzy and dumb. Dumb is just not knowing. Ditzy is having the courage to ask!
en_quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

en_quotes.quote: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Untutored courage is useless in the face of educated bullets
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: Who could refrain that had a heart to love and in that heart courage to make love known?
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: I never thought much of the courage of a lion tamer. Inside the cage he is at least safe from people
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: A great part of courage is the courage of having done the thing before
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Every man has his own courage, and is betrayed because he seeks in himself the courage of other persons
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Those who lack the courage will always find a philosophy to justify it
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: You must study to be frank with the world: Frankness is the child of honesty and courage
en_quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

en_quotes.quote: Courage is a kind of salvation
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Honest conviction is my courage; the Constitution is my guide
en_quotes.author: Andrew Johnson

en_quotes.quote: To have courage for whatever comes in life - everything lies in that
en_quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

en_quotes.quote: Optimism is the foundation of courage
en_quotes.author: Nicholas M. Butler

en_quotes.quote: Real nobility is based on scorn, courage, and profound indifference
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: The strangest, most generous, and proudest of all virtues is true courage
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Courage is on display every day, and only the courageous wring the most out of life
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: The paradox of courage is that a man must be a little careless of his life even in order to keep it
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: Courage doesn't come by doing what everybody else says. Courage does by what you know is right
en_quotes.author: Nikki Haley

en_quotes.quote: It takes courage to be an entrepreneur
en_quotes.author: Adam Neumann

en_quotes.quote: Caesar was a man of great common sense and good taste, meaning thereby a man without originality or moral courage
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: I know of no higher fortitude than stubborness in the face of overwhelming odds
en_quotes.author: Louis Nizer

en_quotes.quote: The man who has the courage of his platitudes is always a successful man
en_quotes.author: Van Wyck Brooks

en_quotes.quote: My talent is such that no undertaking, however vast in size... has ever surpassed my courage
en_quotes.author: Peter Paul Rubens

en_quotes.quote: The weak in courage is strong in cunning
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: One man with courage is a majority
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: When God speaks, oftentimes His voice will call for an act of courage on our part
en_quotes.author: Charles Stanley

en_quotes.quote: Bravery is being the only one who knows you're afraid
en_quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

en_quotes.quote: The truth won't set us free - until we develop the skills and the habit and the talent and the moral courage to use it
en_quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

en_quotes.quote: Being gifted needs courage
en_quotes.author: Georg Brandes

en_quotes.quote: People with courage and character always seem sinister to the rest
en_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

en_quotes.quote: To create one's world in any of the arts takes courage
en_quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

en_quotes.quote: It takes as much courage to have tried and failed as it does to have tried and succeeded
en_quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: He who is brave is free
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: The courage to be is the courage to accept oneself, in spite of being unacceptable
en_quotes.author: Paul Tillich

en_quotes.quote: Decision is a risk rooted in the courage of being free
en_quotes.author: Paul Tillich

en_quotes.quote: The courage to be is rooted in the God who appears when God has disappeared in the anxiety of doubt
en_quotes.author: Paul Tillich

en_quotes.quote: Courage, above all things, is the first quality of a warrior
en_quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

en_quotes.quote: Courage is very important. Like a muscle, it is strengthened by use
en_quotes.author: Ruth Gordon

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing in the world so much admired as a man who knows how to bear unhappiness with courage
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Courage means standing next to someone you don't always agree with for the betterment of the country
en_quotes.author: Amy Klobuchar

en_quotes.quote: My sword I give to him that shall succeed me in my pilgrimage, and my courage and skill to him that can get it
en_quotes.author: John Bunyan

en_quotes.quote: Conscience is the root of all true courage; if a man would be brave let him obey his conscience
en_quotes.author: James Freeman Clarke

en_quotes.quote: Moral courage is higher and a rarer virtue than physical courage
en_quotes.author: William Slim

en_quotes.quote: It takes courage to know when you ought to be afraid
en_quotes.author: James A. Michener

en_quotes.quote: Limit to courage? There is no limit to courage
en_quotes.author: Gabriele D'Annunzio

en_quotes.quote: Have the courage to act instead of react
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: He who loses wealth loses much; he who loses a friend loses more; but he that loses his courage loses all
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

en_quotes.quote: Unless a reviewer has the courage to give you unqualified praise, I say ignore the bastard
en_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

en_quotes.quote: Courage can't see around corners but goes around them anyway
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: You will find as you grow older that courage is the rarest of all qualities to be found in public life
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Political courage is not political suicide
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: I had to find the courage to turn my life around
en_quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

en_quotes.quote: Life is to be entered upon with courage
en_quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

en_quotes.quote: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of readiness to die
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: Courage in danger is half the battle
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: You can always find a reason to say no. It's the easiest vote. It's also not exactly a red badge of courage
en_quotes.author: John Cornyn

en_quotes.quote: True courage is not the brutal force of vulgar heroes, but the firm resolve of virtue and reason
en_quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

en_quotes.quote: Real courage is when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what
en_quotes.author: Harper Lee

en_quotes.quote: Courage and grace are a formidable mixture. The only place to see it is in the bullring
en_quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

en_quotes.quote: Art, it seems to me, doesn't need freedom so much as it needs courage and love - some would call it 'soul' or 'Eros.'
en_quotes.author: Michael Leunig

en_quotes.quote: The courage of a soldier is heightened by his knowledge of his profession
en_quotes.author: Publius Flavius Vegetius Renatus

en_quotes.quote: I would kiss you, had I the courage
en_quotes.author: Edouard Manet

en_quotes.quote: Men was formed for society, and is neither capable of living alone, nor has the courage to do it
en_quotes.author: William Blackstone

en_quotes.quote: Morality may consist solely in the courage of making a choice
en_quotes.author: Leon Blum

en_quotes.quote: White Material' is about courage and craziness
en_quotes.author: Claire Denis

en_quotes.quote: One has to have the courage of one's pessimism
en_quotes.author: Ian Mcewan

en_quotes.quote: No man in the world has more courage than the man who can stop after eating one peanut
en_quotes.author: Channing Pollock

en_quotes.quote: Have the courage to face a difficulty lest it kick you harder than you bargain for
en_quotes.author: Stanislaus I

en_quotes.quote: Religion in its humility restores man to his only dignity, the courage to live by grace
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: So the brother in black offers to these United States the source of courage that endures, and laughter
en_quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

en_quotes.quote: The principal act of courage is to endure and withstand dangers doggedly rather than to attack them
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: If we survive danger it steels our courage more than anything else
en_quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

en_quotes.quote: Either life entails courage, or it ceases to be life
en_quotes.author: E. M. Forster

en_quotes.quote: There are pretenders to piety as well as to courage
en_quotes.author: Moliere

en_quotes.quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: Cold and fire has a way of creeping into the tiniest crack in your courage and finding that coward
en_quotes.author: Tim Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: You can't test courage cautiously
en_quotes.author: Annie Dillard

en_quotes.quote: Courage is being afraid but going on anyhow
en_quotes.author: Dan Rather

en_quotes.quote: Fashion should not be expected to serve in the stead of courage or character
en_quotes.author: Loretta Young

en_quotes.quote: Every man of courage is a man of his word
en_quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

en_quotes.quote: The test of courage comes when we are in the minority. The test of tolerance comes when we are in the majority
en_quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

en_quotes.quote: I've always been independent. I've always had courage. But I didn't always own my diabetes
en_quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

en_quotes.quote: I have always had the courage for the new things that life sometimes offers
en_quotes.author: Wallis Simpson

en_quotes.quote: I learned that moral courage is harder than physical courage
en_quotes.author: Tim O'Brien

en_quotes.quote: When you really believe in God, it gives you a courage, a confidence that enables you to meet the things coming
en_quotes.author: Della Reese

en_quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage to face up to things you can't do because we feed ourselves so much denial
en_quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

en_quotes.quote: Never undertake anything for which you wouldn't have the courage to ask the blessings of heaven
en_quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

en_quotes.quote: Physical bravery is an animal instinct; moral bravery is much higher and truer courage
en_quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

en_quotes.quote: To be a Bond girl you need courage, charm, determination and feistiness
en_quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

en_quotes.quote: I cannot think of a greater symbol of human resistance and courage than our Nobel laureate colleague Andrei Sakharov
en_quotes.author: Torsten Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: It often takes more courage to change one's opinion than to keep it
en_quotes.author: Willy Brandt

en_quotes.quote: Whatever enlarges hope will also exalt courage
en_quotes.author: William Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: You don't actually need confidence or good self-esteem to be successful. You just need to have courage
en_quotes.author: Lela Loren

en_quotes.quote: Being an immigrant gives you so much courage
en_quotes.author: Dania Ramirez

en_quotes.quote: True courage is a result of reasoning. A brave mind is always impregnable
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Collier

en_quotes.quote: I took my courage in both hands and went to the Laundromat to do my washing. I had to use three machines
en_quotes.author: Julie Doucet

en_quotes.quote: Support the strong, give courage to the timid, remind the indifferent, and warn the opposed
en_quotes.author: Whitney M. Young

en_quotes.quote: Valor lies just halfway between rashness and cowardice
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

en_quotes.quote: The courage we desire and prize is not the courage to die decently, but to live manfully
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Perfect courage is to do without witnesses what one would be capable of doing with the world looking on
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Today we affirm a new commitment to live out our nation's promise through civility, courage, compassion and character
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: Who asks whether the enemy was defeated by strategy or valor?
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: In strife who inquires whether stratagem or courage was used?
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: In fact, my courage and my bravery at a young age was the thing I was bullied for, a kind of 'Who do you think you are?'
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: The more wit the less courage
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is a form of social courage
en_quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

en_quotes.quote: You have to have courage to be obedient to God
en_quotes.author: Charles Stanley

en_quotes.quote: The courage of the poet is to keep ajar the door that leads into madness
en_quotes.author: Christopher Morley

en_quotes.quote: Let us answer the terrorists by living our values with courage
en_quotes.author: Angela Merkel

en_quotes.quote: Fate loves the fearless
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: We live in a world in which courage is in less supply than genius
en_quotes.author: Peter Thiel

en_quotes.quote: The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice, it is conformity
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: What separated Ed Murrow from the rest of the pack was courage
en_quotes.author: Dan Rather

en_quotes.quote: A wise woman knows how to summon her courage and do what is right, rather than what is easy
en_quotes.author: Suze Orman

en_quotes.quote: I think the best comedians have that bravery and courage to say, 'This is what it is. This is unfair; that's not cool.'
en_quotes.author: Hasan Minhaj

en_quotes.quote: It is the mainspring of life, courage. And courage has many faces
en_quotes.author: Oriana Fallaci

en_quotes.quote: I have the courage of my convictions
en_quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

en_quotes.quote: I don't like baseball movies. I like movies about moral courage and people who are indomitable and courageous and right
en_quotes.author: Harrison Ford

en_quotes.quote: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount
en_quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

en_quotes.quote: Courage easily finds its own eloquence
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: Good courage in a bad affair is half of the evil overcome
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: To live we must conquer incessantly, we must have the courage to be happy
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: The Scarecrow needed a brain, the Tin Man needed a heart, and the other dude needed courage. I need love. You feel me?
en_quotes.author: Ghostface Killah

en_quotes.quote: Lily Tomlin was one of the early comedy greats who influenced my courage to be the person I am
en_quotes.author: Tracee Ellis Ross

en_quotes.quote: The courage of a soldier is found to be the cheapest and most common quality of human nature
en_quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

en_quotes.quote: The only reason courage exists is because sometimes it is required
en_quotes.author: Andy Dunn

en_quotes.quote: If human beings had genuine courage, they'd wear their costumes every day of the year, not just on Halloween
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: Grave was the man in years, in looks, in word, his locks were grey, yet was his courage green
en_quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

en_quotes.quote: We had no more courage than Harriet Tubman or Marcus Garvey had in their times. We just had a more vulnerable enemy
en_quotes.author: Stokely Carmichael

en_quotes.quote: Work on something that matters. Have courage
en_quotes.author: Ginni Rometty

en_quotes.quote: I saw a complete lack of courage in Washington to tackle some of our biggest challenges
en_quotes.author: Valerie Jarrett

en_quotes.quote: Change will never happen when people lack the ability and courage to see themselves for who they are
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: One of the greatest gifts my father gave me - unintentionally - was witnessing the courage with which he bore adversity
en_quotes.author: Ben Okri

en_quotes.quote: Our film examines the heroism, courage and prowess of the Soviet submarine force in ways never seen before
en_quotes.author: Kathryn Bigelow

en_quotes.quote: At the same time, I would add that the American people have a lot of courage
en_quotes.author: Tadao Ando

en_quotes.quote: Courage is action, not talk
en_quotes.author: Jeff Rich

en_quotes.quote: We don't talk about courage much in our everyday conversations, but I am comfortable with it now
en_quotes.author: Victoria Pendleton

en_quotes.quote: Courage is the art of being the only one who knows you're scared to death
en_quotes.author: Earl Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Courage is simply the willingness to be afraid and act anyway
en_quotes.author: Robert Anthony

en_quotes.quote: Individual courage is the only interesting thing in life
en_quotes.author: Simone Signoret

en_quotes.quote: The best protection any woman can have... is courage
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

en_quotes.quote: I don't understand why people say that I am full of courage. I feel terribly nervous
en_quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

en_quotes.quote: I try to be a truthful artist and I try to show a level of courage. I enjoy that. I'm a messenger
en_quotes.author: Jeff Koons

en_quotes.quote: It's a courageous thing to do something that doesn't have rules or limits
en_quotes.author: Vanessa Paradis

en_quotes.quote: Smart growth is having the courage to say yes and having the courage to say no
en_quotes.author: Tom Perez

en_quotes.quote: I love Joan Collins. She's a wonderful lady. She has such courage. She's such a good actress
en_quotes.author: Robert Wagner

en_quotes.quote: If you are lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it
en_quotes.author: John Irving

en_quotes.quote: A man of courage never needs weapons, but he may need bail
en_quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

en_quotes.quote: Necessity does the work of courage
en_quotes.author: Nicholas M. Butler

en_quotes.quote: The trials on the road to world harmony are no greater than the courage of those who accept the challenge
en_quotes.author: Carl Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Courage is heartworth making itself felt in deeds. It never waits for chances; it makes chances
en_quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

en_quotes.quote: When you love someone deeply, you give strength, and when you are loved deeply, you gain courage
en_quotes.author: Scott Cook

en_quotes.quote: All we can do is find the courage to stand still and to look backwards
en_quotes.author: Joshua Oppenheimer

en_quotes.quote: Courage is soldiers fighting on the front line, or people living on the bread line
en_quotes.author: Hugh Grant

en_quotes.quote: To just meet people that have Crohn's or colitis and to hear their stories gives me a lot of hope and a lot of courage
en_quotes.author: Mike McCready

en_quotes.quote: To find the courage to do what I want to do for myself has been hard
en_quotes.author: Brie Larson

en_quotes.quote: I always disliked dogs, those protectors of cowards who lack the courage to fight an assailant themselves
en_quotes.author: August Strindberg

en_quotes.quote: Courage doesn't grow overnight. It can be a long process
en_quotes.author: Greta Gerwig

en_quotes.quote: If one girl with courage is a revolution, imagine what feats we can achieve together
en_quotes.author: Queen Rania of Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Courage is the birthplace of confidence
en_quotes.author: Debbie Millman

en_quotes.quote: If I'd had more courage, I would've pursued a less commercial path. Maybe I would've gone into musical theater
en_quotes.author: Debbie Millman

en_quotes.quote: I like to go see films that give me courage and hope
en_quotes.author: Isabelle Adjani

en_quotes.quote: On social media, I can hide behind the computer or the iPhone. Internet courage
en_quotes.author: Joel Embiid

en_quotes.quote: In my experience as CEO, I found that the most important decisions tested my courage far more than my intelligence
en_quotes.author: Ben Horowitz

en_quotes.quote: It takes great courage to be vulnerable. It takes enormous strength to be a real woman
en_quotes.author: John Eldredge

en_quotes.quote: Courage to be is the key to revelatory power of the feminist revolution
en_quotes.author: Mary Daly

en_quotes.quote: To be an actor takes a lot of courage, but the way I did it takes less courage. I was very lucky
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Sisto

en_quotes.quote: Acting is really about having the courage to fail in front of people
en_quotes.author: Adam Driver

en_quotes.quote: Most men, I think, wonder about their courage. How would they act in combat? Under torture?
en_quotes.author: Richard Cohen

en_quotes.quote: Courage is the capacity to confront what can be imagined
en_quotes.author: Leo Rosten

en_quotes.quote: Maybe in the workplace I have more courage than other areas in my life
en_quotes.author: Naomi Watts

en_quotes.quote: I want to thank the Academy for its courage and generosity
en_quotes.author: Elia Kazan

en_quotes.quote: Republicans in Hollywood hide. I'm challenging them to stand up and have courage. I won't be scared into submission
en_quotes.author: Stacey Dash

en_quotes.quote: The courage in journalism is sticking up for the unpopular, not the popular
en_quotes.author: Geraldo Rivera

en_quotes.quote: I regained my courage because of the fans who showed their support, asking me to keep singing
en_quotes.author: Jessica Jung

en_quotes.quote: The courage of very ordinary people is all that stands between us and the dark
en_quotes.author: Pam Brown

en_quotes.quote: The Brazilian poet Vinicius de Moraes wrote that beauty is fundamental. Well, with the poet's permission, so is courage
en_quotes.author: Tina Brown

en_quotes.quote: It takes a certain courage and a certain greatness to be truly base
en_quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

en_quotes.quote: Until the day of his death, no man can be sure of his courage
en_quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

en_quotes.quote: Often the test of courage is not to die but to live
en_quotes.author: Vittorio Alfieri

en_quotes.quote: Ofttimes the test of courage becomes rather to live than to die
en_quotes.author: Vittorio Alfieri

en_quotes.quote: We simply do not understand our place in the universe and have not the courage to admit it
en_quotes.author: Barry Lopez

en_quotes.quote: A man of courage flees forward, in the midst of new things
en_quotes.author: Jacques Maritain

en_quotes.quote: Living authentically isn't an act of courage as much as an act of survival
en_quotes.author: Sarah McBride

en_quotes.quote: Any real piece of writing is an act of courage
en_quotes.author: Amitava Kumar

en_quotes.quote: The world will step aside for nearly anyone who has the courage of his of her opinions
en_quotes.author: George Weinberg

en_quotes.quote: Farrah Fawcett had courage, she had strength, and she had faith
en_quotes.author: Jaclyn Smith

en_quotes.quote: What I like most about Bolano is his courage
en_quotes.author: Sam Shepard

en_quotes.quote: The West needs leaders with the courage and the will to fight the scourge of radical Islam
en_quotes.author: Pete Hoekstra

en_quotes.quote: So many times I wanted to go to Auschwitz, but I couldn't take up the courage to go there
en_quotes.author: Frank Lowy

en_quotes.quote: Courage is the essential element in any great public man or woman
en_quotes.author: Paul Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Next to courage, willpower is the most important thing in politics
en_quotes.author: Paul Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I learned so much from 'Iron Chef' about ingredients, about the courage to put yourself out there
en_quotes.author: Alex Guarnaschelli

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is a system based on courage
en_quotes.author: Charles Peguy

en_quotes.quote: When I was straight, I had the courage and energy to become an actress. I owe my career to my will to stop using
en_quotes.author: Kirstie Alley

en_quotes.quote: I've always been inspired by artists who have shown musical and intellectual curiosity and the courage to take risks
en_quotes.author: Renee Fleming

en_quotes.quote: I have a lot of courage. I'm a realist
en_quotes.author: Elisabeth Rohm

en_quotes.quote: Courage is just fear, plus prayers, plus understanding
en_quotes.author: Edward Albert

en_quotes.quote: I've always been attracted to films which explore the qualities of courage
en_quotes.author: John Rhys-Davies

en_quotes.quote: Speaking up for the truth isn't always easy. It takes courage, but it's necessary
en_quotes.author: Amber Valletta

en_quotes.quote: Marriaga has heart. He has the courage to get into the ring and fight. I respect that a lot
en_quotes.author: Vasyl Lomachenko

en_quotes.quote: When you put on clothes that are fighting against something, you can feel your courage grow. Clothing can set you free
en_quotes.author: Rei Kawakubo

en_quotes.quote: Deep Throat's information, and in my view, courage, allowed the newspaper to use what he knew and suspected
en_quotes.author: Bob Woodward

en_quotes.quote: One of the marks of a gift is to have the courage of it
en_quotes.author: Katherine Anne Porter

en_quotes.quote: In professional work - certainly in the arts and graphics - 99% of people have zero courage. They blow with the wind
en_quotes.author: George Lois

en_quotes.quote: I have a huge political interest. I just wish I had the courage to come into politics in India
en_quotes.author: Shekhar Kapur

en_quotes.quote: I admire people who come to politics because it takes a lot of courage to be in politics in India
en_quotes.author: Shekhar Kapur

en_quotes.quote: Courage: Great Russian word, fit for the songs of our children's children, pure on their tongues, and free
en_quotes.author: Anna Akhmatova

en_quotes.quote: Resignation is the courage of Christian sorrow
en_quotes.author: Alexandre Vinet

en_quotes.quote: There can be a fundamental gulf of gracelessness in a human heart which neither our love nor our courage can bridge
en_quotes.author: Patrick Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Courage is always the surest wisdom
en_quotes.author: Wilfred Grenfell
